job_description:
Key Responsibilities : Lead and mentor a marketing analytics team to enhance efficiency and throughputCollaborate with stakeholders to develop scalable solutions and report progress to executive leadershipWork cross-functionally with data infrastructure, engineering, and operations teams to ensure data availability and accuracyRequired Qualifications : 6+ years of relevant experience in analytical problem solving using quantitative approaches2+ years of experience leading an analytics team and mentoring analystsProficiency in SQL, Excel modeling, and Tableau dashboard buildingExperience in ecommerce or an analytical role at a B2C or marketplace tech companyUnderstanding of statistical significance, A / B testing, and experimentation for web or software

Last updated : 2024-03-19

Qualifications: Required Qualifications : 6+ years of relevant experience in analytical problem solving using quantitative approaches2+ years of experience leading an analytics team and mentoring analysts
Proficiency in SQL, Excel modeling, and Tableau dashboard building
Experience in ecommerce or an analytical role at a B2C or marketplace tech company
Understanding of statistical significance, A / B testing, and experimentation for web or software
Responsibilities: Key Responsibilities : Lead and mentor a marketing analytics team to enhance efficiency and throughput
Collaborate with stakeholders to develop scalable solutions and report progress to executive leadership
Work cross-functionally with data infrastructure, engineering, and operations teams to ensure data availability and accuracy
